setActivation(Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>) - Method in class NeuralNet.NeuralNetwork
define the activation function used by the neural network
setActivation(Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>) - Method in class NeuralNet.NeuralNetwork
define the activations functions used by the neural network:

all of the layer will use the first activation function except the output layer which will use the second one
setActivation(functions) - Method in class NeuralNet.NeuralNetwork
do the same thing as setActivation(Function, Function) but with the built-in activation function
setActivation(functions[]) - Method in class NeuralNet.NeuralNetwork
do the same thing as setActivation(Function[], Function[]) but with the built-in activation function
setActivation(functions, functions) - Method in class NeuralNet.NeuralNetwork
do the same thing as setActivation(Function, Function,Function,Function) but with the built-in activation function
setCustomActivation(Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>) - Method in class NeuralNet.Perceptron
assign custom activation function to the perceptron. usefull if your activation function isn't in the utilities library.
setCustomActivation(Function<Float, Float>, Function<Float, Float>, boolean) - Method in class NeuralNet.Perceptron
assign custom activation function to the perceptron. usefull if your activation function isn't in the utilities library.
